casebody.data:
Maria A. GREGORY, Petitioner, v. UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE, Respondent. No. 00-3123. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 17, 2002.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, CLEVENGER, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

ON REMAND FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATES

ORDER

On November 13, 2001, the Supreme Court of the United States issued a decision in United States Postal Service v. Gregory, 534 U.S. 1, 122 S.Ct. 431, 151 L.Ed.2d 323 (2001). On January 8, 2002, this court received a certified copy of the *668judgment from the clerk of the Supreme Court.

Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED THAT:

The mandate issued on July 20, 2000 is recalled and appeal No. 00-3123 is reinstated.
